scripts.build-dotnet-version: cross-env-shell dotnet publish -r linux-x64 --self-contained false IdentityOAuthSpaExtensions.Example/IdentityOAuthSpaExtensions.Example.csproj -c Release -o publish $VERSION
scripts.docker-push: cross-env-shell docker push registry.gitlab.com/artur.drobinskiy/identity-oauth-spa-extensions:latest && cross-env-shell docker push registry.gitlab.com/artur.drobinskiy/identity-oauth-spa-extensions:$npm_package_version
scripts.build: yarn build-dotnet && yarn docker-build && yarn docker-push && yarn version --patch
